statements: SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE data_type = 'document';
SELECT timestamp, action, status FROM access_logs WHERE status = 'success';
SELECT log_id, user_id, data_type, data_id FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'read' AND user_id = 25;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM access_logs;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM access_logs WHERE data_type = 'document' AND status = 'approved';
SELECT user_id, data_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id, data_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT data_id FROM access_logs WHERE status = 'denied' AND action = 'delete' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(data_id) AS avg_data_id FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND action = 'view';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT log_id, access_time, granted_access FROM access_logs WHERE log_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT accessed_table FROM access_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE granted_access = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, accessed_table, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE granted_access = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT accessed_table, COUNT(*) AS num_access FROM access_logs GROUP BY accessed_table ORDER BY num_access DESC;
SELECT log_id, detected_time, unauthorized_table, action_taken FROM unauthorized_accesses WHERE user_id = 202 ORDER BY detected_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT accessed_data, access_time, user_id FROM unauthorized_access ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS access_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY access_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT u.username, a.accessed_data, ua.access_time FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN unauthorized_access ua ON a.log_id = ua.log_id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM access_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, accessed_data FROM access_log WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_access WHERE access_granted = TRUE;
SELECT data_name, sensitive_data FROM data_table ORDER BY data_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM access_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, accessed_data FROM access_log WHERE user_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_access WHERE access_granted = TRUE;
SELECT data_name, sensitive_data FROM data_table WHERE data_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT table_name, sensitive_data FROM Tables WHERE sensitive_data = TRUE;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_timestamp FROM AccessLogs WHERE access_type = 'Read' ORDER BY access_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AuditTrail ORDER BY audit_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, access_timestamp, accessed_table FROM AccessLogs WHERE access_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, table_name, permission_type FROM Users u JOIN Permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN Tables t ON p.table_id = t.table_id;

SELECT u.username, a.action_taken, a.action_timestamp FROM Users u JOIN Permissions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN AuditTrail a ON p.permission_id = a.log_id WHERE a.action_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT count(user_id) AS user_count, table_name FROM Permissions p JOIN Tables t ON p.table_id = t.table_id GROUP BY table_name ORDER BY user_count DESC;
